title: Initialize workspace and copy templates
acceptance: workspace模板文件齐全（含 error sinks: QUALITY_GATE/RUN_ERRORS）

title: Draft kickoff questions + seed queries
acceptance: DECISIONS含C0问题块；queries.md 含非空关键词

title: Write review protocol (search/inclusion/exclusion)
acceptance: 包含数据库/检索式/时间窗/纳入排除/提取字段

title: Human approve protocol
acceptance: 勾选 DECISIONS.md 的 Approve C1（并记录 protocol）

title: Collect candidate pool (multi-route) and write retrieval report
acceptance: 候选池有足够覆盖（或>=100条记录）；每条含 title/authors/year/url + 稳定标识（arxiv_id/doi）+ provenance；retrieval_report.md 记录来源与缺失字段统计

title: Dedupe candidate pool (keep auditable pool)
acceptance: papers_dedup.jsonl 去重后重复率<2%；core_set.csv 可作为候选池索引（systematic review 不应静默丢 papers）

title: Run screening and produce screening log
acceptance: title/abstract筛选完成且有决策与理由（理由需可追溯到 protocol 条款）

title: Extract full-text data into table
acceptance: 纳入论文100%完成字段提取（按 protocol schema）

title: Assess bias/risk-of-bias fields in extraction table
acceptance: 偏倚字段存在并对每篇纳入论文填写 low/unclear/high + notes

title: Synthesize evidence (PROSE allowed)
acceptance: 每主张有证据链；局限性与偏倚明确；结论不过度外推

title: Contract audit (artifact contract + target_artifacts)
acceptance: CONTRACT_REPORT.md 状态为 PASS（且无 DONE 输出缺失；target_artifacts 缺失=0）
